sentences.en: ...massive terraces of corn and millet carved into the mountainside like giant steps.
sentences.cn: …山坡上开垦出来种玉米和小米的巨型台阶般的大块大块梯田。

sentences.en: A flight of stone steps leads to the terrace.
All rooms have a balcony or terrace.
sentences.cn: 所有的房间都有阳台或露台。

sentences.en: Both a staircase and a lift connect the two floors with an enclosed terrace on the roof.
sentences.cn: 通过一道楼梯和一台电梯连接两层楼和封闭的屋顶平台。

sentences.en: Flaming torches were positioned at intervals along the terrace.
sentences.cn: 沿台阶每隔一段距离布置有燃烧着的火炬.

sentences.en: He sat on the terrace of his sun-drenched villa in the South of France.
sentences.cn: 他坐在自己位于法国南部的阳光别墅的露天平台上。

sentences.en: He went into the Terrace and asked for a can of coffee.
sentences.cn: 他走进露台饭店,去要一罐咖啡.

sentences.en: I was quite a long way away, on the terrace.
sentences.cn: 我在露台上，离得还挺远。

sentences.en: I will take the things back to the Terrace. "
sentences.cn: 我要把这些东西送回露台饭店. ”

sentences.en: Mirrored walls, skylights and large plated windows overlooking the garden and terrace fill this modern space with light.
sentences.cn: 镜墙、天窗和大型的金属镀窗俯瞰花园和阳台，让这个现代空间充满光线。

sentences.en: Nervously clutching our glasses of chilled wine, we gathered on the terrace.
sentences.cn: 我们聚集在露台上,手里紧张地握着盛有冰镇葡萄酒的酒杯.

sentences.en: She was waiting for him at the cafe terrace.
sentences.cn: 她在咖啡馆露台上等他.

sentences.en: Single room in lovely flat, roof terrace, non-smoking prof., woman pref.
sentences.cn: 舒适公寓中的单间，带屋顶阳台，不抽烟的职业人士，女士优先。

sentences.en: Some guests recline in deck chairs on the sea-facing terrace.
sentences.cn: 有些客人斜躺在朝海露台的躺椅上。

sentences.en: Some guests recline in lounge chairs on the sea-facing terrace.
sentences.cn: 在面向大海的平台上一些客人斜躺在躺椅上。

sentences.en: The music from the party wafts out to the terrace.
sentences.cn: 晚会的音乐飘到了外面的露台上。

sentences.en: There is an inviting restaurant with an outdoor terrace.
sentences.cn: 有一家诱人的带露天阳台的饭馆。

sentences.en: They sat on the clubhouse terrace, downing a round of drinks.
sentences.cn: 他们坐在俱乐部会所的露台上，大口喝着别人请的饮料。

sentences.en: We sit on the terrace, which looks out on the sea.
sentences.cn: 我们坐在面朝大海的露台上。

trans.tran_cn: 台阶，阶地，阳台，柱廊，门廊，斜坡上房屋间的街巷
trans.tran_en: a flat outdoor area next to a building or on a roof, where you can sit outside to eat, relax etc
